@syed-ahmed Ah, sorry, I didn't mean to pre-empt your work, it just sounded like a pretty grave bug - given that we move more and more things to ATen. I'm not sure I scanned your code right, but would it be reasonable to reset the `offset` when setting the seed? That's what my patch does.

I look forward to having better random in PyTorch, thank you for your hard work!
